title: Simple release smoke tester (Python script)
description: Simple tool... you give it the RC URL, and it loads all artifacts from there and does basic smoke testing of them (verifies sigs/digests match; unpacks; runs "ant test", runs Lucene's demo, etc.).

comments.content:
Patch.

It runs for me, on Linux, but it's still got some constants baked into my env (eg paths to Java 1.5 and 1.6).  But I think we can commit now and iterate on the next release...
comments.author: Michael McCandless
